sentences.english: It is just blatantly and brutally LAZY and TIRED.
sentences.chinese: 完全就是喫果果的令人髮指的懶惰和疲乏。

sentences.english: My weariness amazes me, I'm branded on my feet.
sentences.chinese: 從頭到腳的疲乏讓我喫驚。

sentences.english: "Let us visit them," said the inspector with an air of fatigue.
sentences.chinese: “我們去看看，”巡察查員帶着疲乏的神色說。

sentences.english: After work I traipsed round the shops buying-food for the family.
sentences.chinese: 下班後，我疲乏地走到商店購買家庭用食物。

sentences.english: Tired out by their journey,the travellers flaked out as soon as they reached their hotel room.
sentences.chinese: 旅客們旅途十分疲乏，到達旅館房間後很快就入睡了。

sentences.english: Warm winds make many people feel enervated and depressed.
sentences.chinese: 熱風使得很多人感到疲乏和壓抑。

sentences.english: You look worn out. You must have been working all day.
sentences.chinese: 你看來很疲乏，想必你是幹了一整天的活了。

sentences.english: It also helps many moms when they are feeling fatigued or even nauseated.
sentences.chinese: 在媽媽們感到疲乏或者噁心的時候，它也能幫上忙。

sentences.english: He had slept more than four hours. His fatigue had passed away.
sentences.chinese: 他睡了四個多鐘頭，疲乏已經過去。

sentences.english: As is known to the world, capitalists are tireless in hunting for super profit.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，資本家對超額利潤的追求總是不知疲乏的。

sentences.english: He feels wrung out with anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 由於焦慮，他感到疲乏不堪。

sentences.english: The youth do not know what weariness is.
sentences.chinese: 少年人不知道什麼叫疲乏。

sentences.english: Mind and body's ising tired is a kind of crisis appearance, it is a healthy main cutthroat.
sentences.chinese: 身心疲乏是一種危機狀態，它是健康的主要殺手。

sentences.english: A section of( wing trailing-edge) flap detached during flight probably due to material fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 一段襟翼在飛行中掉落可能因材料疲乏。

sentences.english: Inchoate and main symptom is complexion cadaverous , tired and faint.
sentences.chinese: 早期主要的症狀爲面色蒼白，疲乏無力。

definition: spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
